date_of_birth.description: [Optional] Date of birth format: `yyyy-mm-dd`. Only required for clients with real-money accounts.

new_password.description: New password. For validation (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address).

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a `verify_email` call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
